original_text: On that day, a person who is up on the roof of his house must not go back down into the house. He must not get his things that are inside the house to take with him. In the same way, people that are working outside in their fields must not go back to their homes.
korean_text: 그 날에 만일 사람이 지붕 위에 있고 그의 세간이 그 집 안에 있으면 그것을 가지러 내려가지 말 것이요 밭에 있는 자도 그와 같이 뒤로 돌이키지 말 것이니라

sentences.original_text: a person who is up on the roof of his house
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 집 지붕 위에 있는 사람은

sentences.original_text: must not go back down into the house.
He must not get his things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 물건을 가져가면 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: must not go back to their homes.
